item.title: Object Registration in OpenFOAM
item.description: Being aware of all the important variables during the simulation is a nice feature to have in any CFD software.

item.title: The forAll Macro in OpenFOAM
item.description: Because of the frequent use of range-like loops in OpenFOAM (in the official code base, forks, and any independent work, for that matter), the developers have provided a “shortcut” to loop through all elements of a listâ€”any list.
